title: Allow all champions in the practice tool
body:
I don't see a reason why you shouldn't be able to try out any champion in the game within the practice tool. Owned or not owned, the practice tool should live up to its name. There are champions I've spent IP on that I ended up hating and had I been able to try them out in the practice tool I wouldn't have bought them.

That's all. I know some people will say just download the PBE. A lot of people don't have the space for that. Needing 2 separate versions of the game installed to test champions seems a bit much.
